rlevante 0.1.0

Link survey data to participant data

link_surveys.Rd

Link survey data to participant data

Usage

link_surveys(surveys, participants)

Arguments

surveys

Survey data as returned by `get_surveys()`.

participants

Participant data as returned by `get_participants()`.

Examples

dataset_spec <- list(list(name = "levante-example-dataset:bm7r", version = "current"))
surveys <- get_surveys(dataset_spec)
#> Please visit the URL below to authenticate with your Redivis account:
#> https://redivis.com/oauth/authorize?user_code=3849d692cd7376f74cf1ff36f63cb124 
#> Error in map(.x, .f, ..., .progress = .progress): ℹ In index: 1.
#> ℹ With name: levante-example-dataset:bm7r.
#> Caused by error in `perform_oauth_login()`:
#> ! 400expired_tokenDevice code expired
participants <- get_participants(dataset_spec)
#> Please visit the URL below to authenticate with your Redivis account:
#> https://redivis.com/oauth/authorize?user_code=f0eb2e3f45b41791003d1717c6a153b3 
#> Error in map(rlang::set_names(user_tables), function(table_name) get_datasets_data(dataset_spec,     table_getter(table_name, max_results))): ℹ In index: 1.
#> ℹ With name: groups.
#> Caused by error in `map()`:
#> ℹ In index: 1.
#> ℹ With name: levante-example-dataset:bm7r.
#> Caused by error in `perform_oauth_login()`:
#> ! 400expired_tokenDevice code expired
survey_data <- surveys |>
  link_surveys(participants)
#> Error: object 'surveys' not found
